Springfield officer shot, killed responding to call

The officer was killed while responding to a domestic violence call in which a woman was shot. The suspect then killed himself, two officials said. (Globe, 4:49 p.m.)

High tides cause more flooding concerns

Flooding is expected today and tomorrow along coastal areas due to extreme tides coupled with strong winds, the National Weather Service said. (Globe, 3:03 p.m.)
